queries.query:
INSERT INTO TB_TITULAR( ID_EMPRESA, NR_MATRICULA, NM_TITULAR, NR_CPF, DT_NASCIMENTO, DT_ADMISSAO, NM_LABEL, NR_REF_CODE, NR_MATRICULA_EMPRESA, DT_DEMISSAO,
USER_CREATED, DT_ALTERED, DT_CREATED ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,
?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )

UPDATE TB_TITULAR SET ID_EMPRESA = ?, NR_MATRICULA = ?, NM_TITULAR = ?, NR_CPF = ?, DT_NASCIMENTO = ?, DT_ADMISSAO = ?, NM_LABEL = ?, NR_REF_CODE = ?, NR_MATRICULA_EMPRESA = ?, DT_DEMISSAO = ?,
USER_ALTERED = ?, DT_ALTERED = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE ID = ?
